PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: TREE2018/00038--- Address: 12 Park AvenueCarshaltonSM5 3ES--- Proposal: 1.	Front Garden 1 x Cherry Tree - Reduce and reshape by 10% (1 metre), remove the damaged limbs and remove the deadwood.2.	1 x Lime Tree - Reduce and reshape (3 metres) back to the old points.3.	Left hand side boundary 1 x Yew Tree - Hedge cut back into shape (0.5 metre) as tight as possible.4.	1 x Strawberry Tree - Reduce the width back from the garden side by 1 metre, reduce the height by 1.2 meters and reduce the remainder of the tree to shape in as best as possible. 5.	Left hand side boundary Conifer hedge over hanging from next door - Hedge cut back the side as tight as possible.6.	Back boundary the tree is in next door's garden 1 x Indian bean tree - Reduce the limb back to the first side branch and reduce the overhang back above the limb by 1.2 metres. --- Status: NOOBJ--- Decision: NOOBJ--- Date Decision Issued: 16-MAY-18---
CONARE Conservation Area: CARSHALTON PARK CA
